segments.text: How do I get to the post office from school ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Turn right outside the school ; go along until you come to the main road ; turn left ; go straight ahead , straight on at the roundabout , down the hill , and turn left at the bottom .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I see . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are welcome . Hope you can find it soon .
segments.speaker: S2
